fullName.jp: グラディオラス・アミシティア

description.jp: ルシス王家の守り手である「王の盾」その一翼を担うアミシティア家の総領。ノクティスとは家柄を超えた親友であり剣の手ほどきをするなど 長らく兄貴分として引っ張ってきた。恵まれた体格と鍛え上げた技による強力なパワープレイを得意とする。
description.gl: The Amicitia family has long served as the shield protecting the kings of Lucis and their household, and Gladiolus is its eldest son. The bond he shares with Noctis transcends that of a bodyguard and his liege. With his prodigious strength, he stands ever ready to keep his companions from harm.

jp.text: 安心しろ 死にゃしねえよ
自然の中だってのが\nまず最高だろうが
オレを信じな\nちゃんと片付ける
攻め甲斐があんじゃねえか
いい加減\n切り替えられねぇのか！？
ちゃんと言えたじゃねえか

gl.text: What's the point? Little chill won't kill ya.
Under the stars、 at one with nature—what's not to like?
I ain't one to leave unfinished business.
What goes in、 must come out.
You need to grow up and get over it.

desc.en:
Raises BRV based on Attack before attacking
AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
Raises party BRV based on HP damage dealt
Self: 5 turns of [King's Shield I] (limit 10)
Allies: 5 turns of [Royal Guard]

Gain 1 stack of [King's Shield] when receiving an attack
Receives ST damage in place of any ally with [Royal Guard]

[King's Shield]
• Self: Raises Max BRV and Attack (+4% at 1 stack, adds 4% per stack)
• Self: Defense +80%
• Self: Reduces BRV damage taken by 60%
• Self: Reduces HP damage taken by 20%

[Royal Guard]
• Self: Reduces BRV damage taken by 60%
• Self: Reduces HP damage taken by 20%
desc.gl:
Increases BRV based on ATK
Group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt
Self: 5 turns 1 level of King's Shield (limit 10)
Allies: 5 turns Royal Guard

King's Shield: Raises level by 1 when taking BRV attack or HP attack, takes damage for single-target attacks on ally with active Royal Guard

「ロイヤルガード」を付与した味方への単体攻撃を自身が受ける
